DOC.brief_summary: In-Shape Nutritional Milk Powder nutritional milk powder contain fiber , probiotic nutrient . This study focus effect fiber probiotic digestive health health well select Filipino mother
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Milk Powder With Fiber Probiotics Digestive Habits General Health Well-being Selected Filipino Mothers .
DOC.criteria: Female 21 35 year age . Has least one child age three . Willingness ability participate study . Suffering mild moderate constipation bowel trouble , nonspecific symptom include bloating , flatulence , gurgling , feel heavy eating , abdominal pain . Slow transit irregular bowel movement ( stool consistency hard usual few bowel movement , i.e . every 23 day less 3 bowel movement per week ) . Agree maintain dietetic measure ( volition previously recommend health/nutrition professional ) , , study period . Subject , subject 's legally acceptable representative , voluntarily sign date informed consent form , approve local Ethics Committee/Institutional Review Board authorization prior participation study . Having participate another trial currently two month prior trial date . Known chronic constipation . Treated gastrointestinal symptom . Regular intake laxative remedy promote digestion ( herbal tea , peppermint etc . ) two week start study study . Consuming dairy product supplement contain Probiotics ( e.g. , yogurt , Lactic acid drink , drinkable yogurt , food supplement , extract ) , Prebiotics ( e.g. , Oligosaccharides ) , fiber supplement within 10 day prior start study study . Currently take ( past 3 month ) dietary fiber supplementation except food source . Previous contraindication fiber supplement ( Crohn 's disease ) . Recently currently antibiotic medication past two week . Known allergy milk protein intolerance lactose . Currently pregnant .
